projects.title: Bipedal Robot (10× BLDC + ODrive)
projects.summary: Designed a 7 kg biped with GIM6010-8 actuators. Implemented torque control via ODrive and explored RL gait policies; added external bearing load-path to protect motors.

projects.title: Robodog Leg — Reinforcement Learning
projects.summary: Built a single-leg testbed; trained PPO for force tracking at 50 Hz; deployed on Pi + MCU with CAN interface to motor drivers.

projects.title: Ivy Technologies — Amazon Robotics Deployment
projects.summary: Led on-site wiring and commissioning of robotic arms; coordinated safety checks and throughput tests; delivered go‑live under deadline.

projects.title: Cu–Ag Alloy Microstructure Study
projects.summary: Characterized phase behavior and hardness vs. heat treatment; wrote scripts to quantify grain size from micrographs.

projects.title: 2×4 Macropad · RP2040
projects.summary: Designed a Pico‑based macropad with QMK‑style firmware; custom PCB and 3D‑printed case; USB‑HID over CircuitPython.
